bibl.seg: Moioli Maria Lauretta, Postille bibliologiche all'"Apocalisse" di Giovanni. Avec résumé en anglais.

Examines the passages of johannine Revelation concerning the books. Recent authors in papyrological studies have faced the problem of the form (codex or roll) of the earlier Christian book. The analysis of the Revelation can support the thesis that the Christians of the first centuries also used the books in papyrusroll form in writing and reading their sacred texts.
